jd: From: Pranjali Sikarwar, Technocraft Solutions pranjali.sikarwar@technocraftsol.com Reply to: pranjali.sikarwar@technocraftsol.com Hello, Hope you are doing well!My name is Pranjali and I'm Technical Recruiter at Technocraft solutions.
